20250414231500 The Spanish Primera Division or La Liga is the top men’s professional football division in Spain.The league is contested by 20 teams over a 38-match day period. Every game is live and exclusive only on beIN with Arabic and English commentary.
TALKING FOOTBALL is an exclusive unique window into Spanish football and the people that have made it what it is. We dress as coaches and join their meetings and private discussions. We talk to LALIGA legends in their environment about deep issues, their successes but also their weaknesses. Wed like to lead the media agenda with conversations that you dont normally hear with managers, players and the most recognisable directors. All that presented by Guillem Balague.

programme.programme:
20250416103000 LaLiga Hypermotion 2024-2025 contested by 22 teams, with the top two teams plus the winner of a play-off promoted to La Liga and replaced by the three lowest-placed teams in that division.
Everyone knows the biggest stadiums in the world. But sometimes its the smallest stadiums that are the most intimidating for players, due to their fans and their fervor. Several big names in football tell you about their experiences in these stadiums where it can sometimes be difficult to play. LaLiga Highlights - Week 31

programme.channel: LaLiga BEST 11 - Luis García

programme.programme:
Luis Garcia was a striker who played 8 seasons in La Liga. He played for Barcelona, Real Valladolid, Atletico Madrid and Real Racing in La Liga. In his career he played 473 games, scoring 115 goals.

The 2024-25 Ligue 1 will be the 87th season of the Ligue 1, Frances premier football competition. Paris Saint-Germain are the three-time defending champions. All games are live and exclusive only on beIN.

20250415014500 The 2024-25 Ligue 2 is the 44th season of the Ligue 2, the second-tier professional football league in France.18 teams competing in a round-robin format. The top three teams will be promoted to Ligue 1, while the teams finishing 17th and 18th will be relegated to National. AS Monaco, a team with a rich history and a strong fan base, is one of the top contenders to win the championship and earn promotion to the top division.

20250414230000 beIN SPORTS AFC Channel dedicated to AFC competitions
Bundesliga 2 division is the mens second professional association football division of the German football league system. Bundesliga 2 is the ideal proving ground for younger players in Germany before stepping up to the Bundesliga, but it’s also simply a great league to watch if you want drama and excitement at a level that still boasts quality.
What do Jamal Musiala, Florian Wirtz, Jude Bellingham, Erling Haaland and Manuel Neuer have in common? They are all children of the Bundesliga, the league where they developed into stars of world format – whether thanks to excellent youth academy work, or equally excellent scouting.In our special report “Hungry for Success – the Bundesliga’s Bright Young Stars” we go behind the scenes at some of Germany’s top clubs. The Bundesliga has a long-established reputation for taking top prospects up to the next level. Every year, in one of the world’s strongest leagues, new stars are born and fresh foundations laid for extraordinary football careers.
20250415031500 The German Bundesliga is live and exclusive only on beIN. The 2024–25 Bundesliga will be the 62nd season of the Bundesliga. The league comprises of 18 teams 16 of which competed in the league campaign during the previous season, while the remaining two were promoted from Bundesliga 2.
Three strikers, three stories, one common goal: scoring goals for the teams success. But what shaped Harry Kane, Patrik Schick, and Hugo Ekitike on their paths to the top? In the 26-minute documentary Roots – Kane, Schick and Ekitike, we travel back to the beginnings of these Bundesliga stars. For FC Bayern Munchen player Harry Kane, we trace his roots in Chingford, a suburban town in East London. We also speak with youth coaches from his first club, Ridgeway Rovers, as well as former Tottenham player and England international Jermain Defoe. Patrik Schick, who has been playing for current Bundesliga champions Bayer 04 Leverkusen since 2020, grew up in the Czech capital, Prague. He developed h

20250414224500 The 2025 U-17 Africa Cup of Nations is the 15th edition of the biennial African youth football tournament organized by Confederation of African Football (CAF) for players aged 17 and below. Morocco was chosen as the host of this edition The top 10 teams will qualify for the 2025 FIFA U-17 World Cup in Qatar as the CAF representatives. It is the first U-17 Africa Cup of Nations to feature 16 teams. Senegal are the defending champions.

Kryklia vs. Knowles is set at Bangkoks Lumpinee Boxing Stadium. The main event features Roman Kryklia defending his ONE Heavyweight Muay Thai World Title against Lyndon Knowles. In the co-main event, Regian Eersel faces Alexis Nicolas in a trilogy bout for the ONE Lightweight Kickboxing World Championship. The card also includes a featherweight Muay Thai clash between Sitthichai Sitsongpeenong and Nico Carrillo.

20250414221500 The 2025 Barcelona Open Banc Sabadell (ATP 500) runs from April 14–20 at the Real Club de Tenis Barcelona. With a reduced 32-player draw, top names like Carlos Alcaraz, Tsitsipas, and Ruud headline the clay-court event. This edition also marks the first without Rafael Nadal and includes a tribute to Bjorn Borg on the 50th anniversary of his 1975 win.

Discover the dedication, passion, and teamwork that go into delivering world-class tennis to millions of viewers across the globe.

An exclusive joint interview featuring three rising Arab tennis talents — Hady Habib (Lebanon), Abdullah Shelbayh (Jordan), and Aziz Dougaz (Tunisia) — as they share their stories, ambitions, and experiences during their participation in the ATP 500 Qatar ExxonMobil Open 2025. In this candid conversation, the players reflect on their personal journeys, the challenges of representing their countries on the global stage, and their hopes for the future of Arab tennis.
The Racket tells the story of John McEnroes unique history at the Australian Open, including insights and reflection from all the key parties involved with his infamous 1990 Australian Open disqualification

20250414233000 2025 Formula 1 Gulf Air Bahrain Grand Prix qualifying session at the Bahrain International Circuit in Sakhir determines the starting grid for the main race. Drivers compete over three knockout rounds to secure pole position on the 5.412 km track, renowned for its blend of long straights and technical corners.

programme.channel: Feature Race - FIA Formula 3 Championship - Bahrain Round

programme.programme:
The 2025 FIA Formula 3 Championship is an open-wheel racing category serving as the third tier of formula racing in the FIA Global Pathway. The category will be run in support of selected rounds of the 2025 FIA Formula One World Championship. As the championship is a spec series, all teams and drivers competing in the championship will run the same car, the Dallara F3 2025. Prema Racing are the reigning Teams Champions
The 2025 FIA Formula 2 Championship is an open-wheel racing category serving as the second tier of formula racing in the FIA Global Pathway. The category will be run in support of selected rounds of the 2025 Formula One World Championship. As the championship is a spec series, all teams and drivers competing in the championship will run the same car, the new Dallara F2 2024. Invicta Racing are the reigning Teams Champions.
20250415074500

20250415002500 The AFC Champions League Two, previously known as the AFC Cup, is aa annual continental club football competition organised by the Asian Football Confederation. It is the second-tier competition of Asian club football, ranked below the AFC Champions League Elite and above the AFC Challenge League.
The 2024–25 AFC Champions League Elite, formerly known as the AFC Champions League, will be the 43rd edition of Asias premier club football tournament. The revamped format, along with the rebranding, sees 24 teams playing eight games against different opponents in the brand new league phase. All matches are live and exclusive only on beIN
20250415084500 AFC Womens Champions League 2024-2025 is the first edition of the Asias premier club womens football tournament organized by the Asian Football Confederation. Twelve teams, divided in three groups, participate in the group. The knockout stage will be played in a single-leg knockout format. The semi-finals and the final match will be played in centralized location.

Season 2024 -2025 will be the first season all UEFA club tournaments are played under a new format. For the UEFA Europa League a 36-team league phase replaces the 32-team group stage. The final will be played on 21 May 2025 at San Mames stadium in Bilbao, Spain.
This week on The Big Interview, two-time Premier League champion, Robert Pires sits down to talk through his career and all things Arsenal. Having joined the club during Arsene Wengers reign, Pires played in one of the greatest sides in the clubs history - as well as helping them achieve Invincible status In 2003/04. The French winger recalls almost quitting football at a young age and how his mother persuaded him to change his mind, winning the World Cup with France, the difficulties he faced when he first joined the Gunners and what this current Arsenal side need to do to win the Premier League title once again
Owen Hargreaves unpacks The Art of... The Central Defensive Midfielder, drawing on his time with England and Manchester United. Featuring contributions from Rodri and Claude Makelele as they discuss the positions dynamics and tactical demands. Plus, a deep dive into Premier League icons like Kante and Fernandinho, players who defined the modern CDM.

We are also introduced to Omar Sulieman, a notable Imam, who acts as narration throughout the series and a guiding voice on the key principles of Islam. The life and career of Sofyan Amrabat is explored, showcasing his role as a key part of the Fenerbahce team in Turkey and the Moroccan national side. Major League Baseball (MLB) is live and exclusive only on beIN. MLB comprises of 30 teams, divided equally between the National League (NL) and the American League (AL), with 29 teams in the United States and 1 in Canada. Los Angeles Dodgers are the current champions.
The wait is over – the nominees for the 2025 Laureus World Sports Awards have been announced! This month on Spirit of Sport, we sit down with six-time MotoGP World Champion and Laureus World Comeback of the Year nominee Marc Marquez as he reflects on his return to the top of the podium in 2024. Episode two of The World Chess Show turns the spotlight on Germany to find out why it remains one of the most important destinations for the game. We join the players at the Schach Bundesliga in Hamburg. It’s the world’s strongest Chess League, featuring many of the top Grandmasters, with many of the teams affiliated to Germany’s Bundesliga football clubs. We also profile Germany’s Number 1 Vincent Keymer, visit the World Chess Club in Berlin and quiz Uzbek Grandmaster Nodirbek Abdusattorov against the clock.
Organized by Difesa Servizi S.p.A., in collaboration with the Navy and with SSi Sports and Events, with the support of ENIT - National Tourism Agency - and the Italian Sailing Federation, the sporting event created to spread the values of the Navy and promote the brand of the Armed Forces through sailing, has become, over the years, an effective tool for promoting tourism and the beauty of the country.
Welcome to the second episode of The Sports Rundown for 2025, where we take you on an electrifying ride through the worlds most thrilling sports arenas, stadiums, and venues. Buckle up for a fast-paced tour that celebrates the heart and soul of global sports! First stop: Canada, where the INVICTUS Games are back with a bang! Since their debut in 2014, this international multi-sport event for wounded, injured, and sick servicemen and women has been an inspiration. The 2025 edition in Vancouver Whistler brought together 550 competitors from 23 nations across 11 adaptive sports, all set against the breathtaking backdrop of British Columbia. Controversial tennis star Nick Kyrgios speaks openly and honestly about his career and battles against his own demons.
The Rolex Monte-Carlo Masters is a prestigious ATP Masters 1000 clay-court tournament held annually at the Monte Carlo Country Club in Roquebrune-Cap-Martin, France, near Monaco. Celebrating its 118th edition in 2025. As the first of three clay-court Masters 1000 tournaments each season, it attracts the worlds top tennis talent, offering valuable points and prize money. The tournament has seen legendary champions, with Rafael Nadal holding a record 11 titles.
The fabulous Lusail International Circuit lies on the outskirts of Doha, the capital city of Qatar. Built in little over a year, the track cost $58 million USD and required round-the-clock dedication from almost 1,000 workers in order to get it ready for the inaugural event - the Marlboro Grand Prix of Qatar on the 2nd October 2004.The track itself is a flowing layout of 5.4 kilometres, surrounded by artificial grass designed to prevent sand from the neighbouring desert from blowing onto the circuit. The 2025 BMW Open in Munich makes its debut as an ATP 500 event, elevating its status on the professional tennis calendar. Held on the clay courts of MTTC Iphitos, the tournament features a 32-player singles draw and offers enhanced facilities, including a new 6,500-seat center court. This marks a significant step forward for one of Germany’s most historic and prestigious tennis events.
